summary:
This is Unofficial Upgrade of PerkUP! ~Ultimate Perk Mod~.
Original creator is Slayerjerman.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9359
descriptionHtml:
This is Unofficial Upgrade of PerkUP! ~Ultimate Perk Mod~.

Original creator is Slayerjerman.
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9359

Seems the author abandoned his project or maybe he too busy.

Anyway, I post my version of this modification.

The shout cooldown perk working in a clean Skyrim (Maybe conflict with another mod?).

MOD DESCRIPTION
===========================
VER 17.5

- Fix mana regeneration perk (effect stacks up, for max effect use mana regeneration from different schools of magic)

- Fix the wolf eyes.

- Removed the perk conditions in alchemy and trade.

- Remove the master trade 2.3.4.5 and so on perk (they don't work).


VER 17.4

0. New Conjuration skill:

- Renowned Necromancer

You are renowned necromancer. Undead creatures, necromancers are your friends. They will not attack you.



1. New Archery skill:

- Tamed Cat (Replace Cat Cry) (Great Power)

Grants ability to summon a tamed cat. (Familiar Lv = Player Lv)

- Tamed Bear (Great Power)

Grants ability to summon a tamed bear. (Familiar Lv = Player Lv)



2. New smithing skill:

- Dwarven Engineer

You have security protocols of dwarven automatons. Ancient mechanisms will not attack you.

- Dwarven Constructor I (Great Power)

Grants ability to construct a Dwarven Spider.

- Dwarven Constructor II (Great Power)

Grants ability to construct a Dwarven Sphere.

- Dwarven Constructor III (Great Power)

Grants ability to construct a Dwarven Centurion.



3. New pickpocket skill:

- Infamous Outlaw

You are Robin Hood, a friend of thieves. Bandits will not attack you.




VER 17.3

0. New magic skills:

Alteration Might
Conjuration Might
Destruction Might
Illusion Might
Restoration Might

All spells will gradually improve (magnitude) as your magic skill grows.


1. New Archery skills:

- Predator Instinct

Weak predators are your friends. They will not attack you.

- Feline Cunning

Big cats are your friends. They will not attack you.

- Clumsy Bear

Bears are your friends. They will not attack you.

- Wolf Eyes (Lesser Power)

Grants ability to see in the dark. Cast once to activate, cast again to dispel the effect.

- Cat Cry (Lesser Power)

Quick scream to interrupt enemy attack. (Cost 24 magic point)

- Bear Rage (Great Power)

You take half damage and do double damage for 120 seconds. (Only one per day)



VER 17.2

- Fix bug with Quick Shot.

- Fix from patch:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32991

- Add ID List

NOTE:
To solve the problem with the speed of bow...

Type in console:

player.removeperk <PerkID>

QuickShot1 00105F19
QuickShot2 xx001061
QuickShot3 xx001062
QuickShot4 xx001063
QuickShot5 xx001064
QuickShot6 xx001065
QuickShot7 xx001066
QuickShot8 xx001067
QuickShot9 xx001068
QuickShot10 xx001069

xx - load mod number

Then...

player.addperk <PerkID>


Example:
I have QuickShot 5 and the load number of PerkUP-Archery is 70...
In game

player.removeperk 70001064
player.addperk 70001064

That's all... :) Have fun...


FILES:
=========================
PerkUP-Alchemy.esp
PerkUP-Alteration.esp
PerkUP-Archery.esp
PerkUP-Block.esp
PerkUP-Conjuration.esp
PerkUP-Destruction.esp
PerkUP-Enchanting.esp
PerkUP-HeavyArmor.esp
PerkUP-Illusion.esp
PerkUP-LightArmor.esp
PerkUP-Lockpicking.esp
PerkUP-OneHanded.esp
PerkUP-Pickpocket.esp
PerkUP-Restoration.esp
PerkUP-Smithing.esp
PerkUP-Sneak.esp
PerkUP-Speech.esp
PerkUP-TwoHanded.esp

INSTALL
===========================

It is highly recommended that you use PerkUP with a NEW SAVE game. Remember to back up all your save games BEFORE using PerkUP because it changes ALOT of perk data.

This mod WILL work with current saved game also, but back up your saves!

Place ESP files in your SKYRIM\DATA\ folder.

Also need Skse for one script.

AFTERWORDS
===========================

Thanks to Bethesda for a great game!

and thanks to Slayerjerman for his modification!
author: Mentour
